entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is mentioned as a character who seems to have put fresh heart into Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the main character in this passage and is described as having his schoolbag swung back over his shoulder.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a location where Ron plans to do practice sessions before taking the test.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the sixth-years who will take the test and is described as saying that Harry would do better in attempting another assault on the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: The Room of Requirement is mentioned as a location that Harry plans to attempt to access again.

entities.name: village
entities.description: The village (presumably Hogsmeade) is mentioned as the destination for Ron and his friends.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in this passage and is described as feeling jealous watching his friends get ready to go into the village.

relationships.description: Ron plans to do practice sessions in Hogsmeade before taking the test.
Hermione advises Harry that he would do better attempting another assault on the Room of Requirement.
Harry plans to attempt to access the Room of Requirement again.
Ron and Hermione are friends, as they are mentioned together in this passage.
Harry misses making trips to the village (presumably Hogsmeade).
